Title: Stolen Phone
Writer: Chris Kelly, Abbi Jacobson (creator), Ilana Glazer (creator)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Luke Guldan, Tom Lipinski
Plot: Abbi loses her phone at a club and adventures all around NYC to find it, while Ilana is hooking up with Tyler, a one night stand who seems too good to be true.
